title: Mienglish
subtitle: The Iu Mien-English Dictionary
desc: This app is a bilingual dictionary and translation tool designed for Iu Mien and English users. It allows users to search words, hear pronunciations, and explore accurate translations between both languages. With a simple and intuitive interface, the app helps preserve Iu Mien language while making communication easier for learners, families, and communities.
